application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted information in pursuant to conditions 6 and 7 of planning permission 223014PANDCM dated 08.09.2022 is deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to adhere to the objective of ensuring acceptable noise and sound insulation in accordance with policies D14, SI 1 of the London Plan 2021, policy 1.1(j) of the Ealing Development Strategy 2026 DPD (2012); and policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Details of Noise Assessment (condition 6) and Sound Insulation (condition 7) pursuant to prior approval 223014PANDCM dated 08.09.2022 for 'Construction of one additional floor to accommodate 4 flats'
